segments.text: Have you read all these crazy things that are going on around the world ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was reading about how some people get tricked or drugged in their hotel rooms and have their organs removed ! Then they are sold on the black market .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't tell me you actually believe all that ? Don't be so gullible , they are just urban legends . They are just stories people make up to scare you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I was also reading about how some popular songs have subliminal or even satanic messages if you play them backwards ! Can you believe that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You really think an artist or song writer is going to go through the trouble of putting subliminal or satanic messages in a song ? Don't be so naive !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well maybe you are right , but how about the story of how KFC has rows of headless chickens which are super grown in order to get bigger chickens faster !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds a bit too far fetched to be true , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S2
